Try not to exceed 200 to 300x magnification. The results with <8-10\'\' mirrors are less than exciting.

I have a 130mm reflector from Mead that I got from the Discovery Store in 96. It is alright, but was not built very well. The tracking gears are shot and some parts have fallen off. Definitely time for an upgrade so I\'m happy I found this thread.
